achievements: Revolutionized women's fashion with designs like the tuxedo suit and safari jacket.
Founded the Yves Saint Laurent fashion house.
Considered one of the most influential fashion designers of the 20th century.
Starred in iconic French films like 'Z' and 'The Wages of Fear'.
Renowned for his charismatic stage presence and powerful vocals.
Collaborated with renowned filmmakers like Jean Renoir and Federico Fellini.
